original_text: He put another parable before them, saying, “The kingdom of heaven is like a grain of mustard seed that a man took and sowed in his field.
korean_text: 또 비유를 들어 이르시되 천국은 마치 사람이 자기 밭에 갖다 심은 겨자씨 한 알 같으니

sentences.original_text: He put another parable before them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 앞에 또 다른 비유를 제시하며,

sentences.original_text: “The kingdom of heaven is like a grain of mustard seed
that a man took and sowed in his field.”
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 가져다 자기 밭에 심은 것이라.”
